law.catch_line: A person who fails to comply with the requirements of an order served under § 5-406 of this subtitl...
law.text:
A person who fails to comply with the requirements of an order served under § 5-406 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to:
For a first offense, a fine not exceeding $1,000; and
For a second or subsequent offense, a fine not exceeding $5,000.
